help.response: ✦ Sure Thing. Here are some words and phrases I look for to respond accordingly: <dl><dt>Hello, Hey, Whats Up</dt><dd>Say Hi!</dd><dt>About MonoDeaf, Who is MonoDeaf</dt><dd>Learn more about MonoDeaf</dd><dt>AI</dt><dd>Explanation of this AI</dd><dt>Who are you</dt><dd>Question the AI</dd><dt>Joke</dt><dd>Receive a random joke</dd><dt>BLCK CLD COLLECTIVE, BLCKCCLDCOLLECTIVE</dt><dd>Learn more about BLCK CLD COLLECTIVE</dd><dt>Contact, Message</dt><dd>Contact MonoDeaf</dd><dt>Music, Releases, Songs</dt><dd>See MonoDeaf's releases on Spotify</dd><dt>Manager</dt><dd>Current manager</dd><dt>Achievements, Milestones</dt><dd>See MonoDeaf's list of milestones</dd><dt>EPK</dt><dd>View and download MonoDeaf's EPK</dd><dt>Web Design, Website</dt><dd>Learn more about MonoDeaf's journey into web-design.</dd><dt>Thanks, Thank you</dt><dd>Give appreciation</dd><dt>I love you</dt><dd>Give love</dd><dt>Goodbye, Bye, See ya</dt><dd>Say goodbye</dd><dt style='color:#fcba03;'>Explicit words</dt><dd>This AI assistant is not a fan of explicit words, so refrain from using them.</dd></dl>

hello.response: ✦ Hi there. How can I help you today?

hey.response: ✦ Hey hey. How can I help you today?

who are you.response: ✦ I am MonoDeaf's assistant. Here to help you with anything... MonoDeaf related, of course.

blck cld collective.response: ✦ BLCK CLD COLLECTIVE is a community initiated record label started by MonoDeaf and 3 close friends, embarking on a sonic journey to shine light on underground and remarkable artists. You can find its website here.

blckcldcollective.response: ✦ BLCK CLD COLLECTIVE is a community initiated record label started by MonoDeaf and 3 close friends, embarking on a sonic journey to shine light on underground and remarkable artists. You can find its website here.

ai.response: ✦ While I am a special AI designed for and by MonoDeaf, I am not your typical AI, like ChatGPT or Gemini. I simply respond to various words and phrases that users may use to know more about MonoDeaf, along with some fun and quirky activities as well. This way, I don't have to rely on API's and servers to help users.

epk.response: ✦ Here is MonoDeaf's EPK [EPK would be here... IF I HAD ONE]

achievements.response:
✦ MonoDeaf has collected his impressive list of milestones.
Collaborations
MonoDeaf has worked with many talented artists, such as Cozmoe, jjjacksen, and more.
Metapop Community Mentor
MonoDeaf was a grand prize winner of the Feedback challenge on Metapop (Acquired by Native Instruments), scoring Native Instruments 'Komplete 13 Ultimate' to his arsenal, and was accepted as the Metapop Community Mentor up until Metapop was unfortunately sunsetted by Native Instruments in 2021.
Stream Milestones

MonoDeaf - FUKIT reached 2,500 streams.

MonoDeaf & Cozmoe - You Will Know Me reached 7,500 streams.

about monodeaf.response: ✦ Half-Deaf producer, Nate Sterling, from Wayne, Ohio, suffered permanent hearing loss in his right ear at a young age from a car accident, but still pursues his dream in electronic music.

who is monodeaf.response: ✦ Half-Deaf producer, Nate Sterling, from Wayne, Ohio, suffered permanent hearing loss in his right ear at a young age from a car accident, but still pursues his dream in electronic music.

web design.response: ✦ Nate embarked on the journey of web design and web development when his record label, BLCK CLD COLLECTIVE, needed a website. His journey started with Carrd, a one page website maker for pretty much anything. Nate enjoyed learning code such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript to break the limiting barriers of carrd for extra features, functionalities and fun interactivity. When the record label's plan called for more features that Carrd couldn't handle, Nate moved the platform over to Ycode. Nate later became an official Ycode expert, and still enjoys creating fun and intricate websites and components in code to bring that extra finesse into his web projects.
